member.name: T:CommonObjectives.Minute
member.summary: Minute holds data related to the minute of the day.

member.summary: Gets or sets the Index is the minute of the day. (hour * 60 + minute).

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.Minute.ActiveApplication
member.summary: Gets or sets the active application from the system monitor.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.Minute.ActiveApplicationTitle
member.summary: Gets or sets the title from the application from the system monitor.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.Minute.Up
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the system is on.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.Minute.Idle
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the system in an idle state. True is the screen save would be on if enabled. WARNING: The value is false when the system is off-line.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.Minute.Billable
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the minute contains any Objective work.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.Minute.PrimaryWorkItem
member.summary: Gets or sets the WorkItem that was deemed as the primary work item for that minute. This is currently decided by the lowest workType index.

member.summary: WorkItem holds data related to work items.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.WorkItem.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the GUID Index.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.WorkItem.Version
member.summary: Gets or sets the version of the WorkItem.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.WorkItem.ObjectiveName
member.summary: Gets or sets the Objective name.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.WorkItem.Start
member.summary: Gets or sets the start time of the work item.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.WorkItem.Finish
member.summary: Gets or sets the finish time of the work item.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.WorkItem.FilePath
member.summary: Gets or sets the File path to the project item's location.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.WorkItem.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the Project name.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.WorkItem.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets the General description of the work item.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.WorkItem.Notes
member.summary: Gets a collection of notes related to the work item.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.WorkItem.WorkType
member.summary: Gets or sets the WorkType related to the work item. This is stored here at the time of creation of the object as the WorkType can be changed.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.WorkItem.Application
member.summary: Gets or sets the application type of the work item. Some work items are not computer related so have no Application type.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.WorkItem.Minutes
member.summary: Gets or sets the calculated number of minutes for the work item. Some items have minimum and maximum values for this set contractually so may not be the number of minutes between the start and finish DateTimes.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.WorkItem.Cost
member.summary: Gets or sets the calculated cost of the work item.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.WorkItem.Invoiced
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the item has been invoiced.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.WorkItem.StartSize
member.summary: Gets or sets a value of the size of the work item at the start. This is irreverent for non commuter based items.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.WorkItem.FinishSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the a value of the size of the work item at the finish. This is irreverent for non commuter based items.

member.name: P:CommonObjectives.WorkItem.IsActive
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the work item is active.

member.name: M:CommonObjectives.WorkItem.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:CommonObjectives.WorkItem.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The name of the work item.
